metadata.title: Guests - Stand Up Comedy by Amit Tandon
metadata.description:
Halwa Tour Tickets are out on Tandonamit.com

Mumbai - 26th Oct
Bengaluru- 1st Nov
Hyderabad- 2nd Nov
Pune - 8th Nov
Nashik - 9th Nov
Lucknow - 16th Nov
Aurangabad - 27th Dec

UK
Reading- 27th Nov
Southampton- 28th Nov
London - 29th Nov

Germany
Stuttgart - 5th Dec
Munich - 6th Dec
Berlin - 7th Dec
